website_summaries.verdict: It's not as much of a conversation piece as the tank-like Alienware 18, but the slimmer, lighter Alienware 17 is arguably more practical for serious gamers with realistic budgets.
pros: Dell's Alienware 17 is highly configurable, looks a bit more sophisticated than previous incarnations, and still delivers excellent performance
cons: You probably don't really want a programmable lightshow for your laptop
No dual-GPU options, and battery life isn't going to help much with on-the-go gaming

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you clean dust for the fan once in a while and everything would be good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this laptop for 3+1/2 years for recording gameplay videos. Of course it cannot support highest graphic quality, but quite enough for me. No error/crashes ever happened. Just make sure you clean dust for the fan once in a while and everything would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Mingzhe Hao

customer_reviews.title: love the computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid computer that I run multiple games on. I don't run anything that really pushes the graphics, but on Civilization, WOW, Starcraft and others there is no framerate lag. Bootup is almost instant... love the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: you see it good at first impression but is inferior to the product ...
customer_reviews.text: dont buy this, the laptops dont come with the dvd reader, its not the product that you see on the picture, you see it good at first impression but is inferior to the product that they are offering, SO PISSED OFF, i am a normal-high amazon buyer and i didnt got ANY problems with ANY product, just one time with a keychain but thats all, and this PC its not the product that they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Victor Tursi Lemole

customer_reviews.title: Gtx880 is awesome, and the LED looks great
customer_reviews.text: Woo, Alienware means high performance. Gtx880 is awesome, and the LED looks great! If you don't care money, choose Alienware.
customer_reviews.author: Yuchi Tang

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Furious.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I swore I wouldn't buy another Dell but this one met my expectations. I'm not a big gamer but I do play Second Life. I've played for 7+ years. The graphics are defined and the regeneration going from location to location is fast. I have slowly added programs and no glitches. I wanted a Window's 7 computer and I am grateful that this laptop came with 7 and not 8. I have another Dell laptop so I can easily compare performance. I would buy it again. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Kay

customer_reviews.title: MONSTER LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laptop and I don't see any problems with it. With the 880M GPU I can play all my games in HIGH settings or Ultra without having any FPS drop
customer_reviews.author: Marco Babao

customer_reviews.title: everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Although it is heavy it does everything I expected. Being away from our home base this is our main computer and has not disappointed. I cant wait to get it home and use our own WiFi to see its real speed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Shelar

customer_reviews.title: Best computer I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This computer makes me cry. The sheer beauty and elegance of this leviathan combined with the absolute computing power makes it the best computer I have ever had the pleasure of using. Boots instantly, comes with tons of performance utilities, plays everything you throw at it effortlessly be it games or codes for work. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Petros Vasilakos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller!. It was an amazing laptop with attractive LED lighting under the keyboard. My son had to return it only because right after he purchased it he received a laptop from a relative as birthday gift. I had a great experience despite the fact that we had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Alienware ALW17-8751sLV 17.3-inch Gaming Computer
customer_reviews.text: The product not as described. The hard drive not configured properly. It offered three-fourths of the one-TB that had been advertised. Initially, the wrong computer was sent - an inferior one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing piece of gaming machine...Windows 7 sucks :(
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful gaming machine. However the preinstalled Window 7 is a big disappointment. They should have installed Windows 8 instead. Other than that, I'd recommend to get this one if you're deciding between other models, as the 17 is not as big and bulky as the 18, and has better performance over the 14. Thank you Dell and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. Favorite feature is the variations of LED lighting for almost every area of the computer. Customizing your LED colors is a great experience, and I'm not even a gamer! I use this to run Solidworks and other heavy duty software
customer_reviews.author: E.N

customer_reviews.title: I have not explored all of the computer's functions as ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not explored all of the computer's functions as of yet however, the i7 CPU and other high performance hardware reduces the wait time for absolutely all functions. As I continue to use the laptop I will update my review...
customer_reviews.author: billbailey 15

customer_reviews.title: i love it, it is very nice,i used 2month is very ...
customer_reviews.text: i love it, it is very nice,i used 2month is very good but i find the cd driver is not working。
customer_reviews.author: flying

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine. Boots up extremely quickly and is meeting ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid machine. Boots up extremely quickly and is meeting every expectation. Although it is a bit pricey you get a lot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, I think it's better to have a Win7 Ultimate OS.
customer_reviews.author: YJreaper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but has a couple cons
customer_reviews.text: Love mine! It runs next gen games really good and the 1 TB memory is great if u like digital downloads.graphics look great! CONS- pretty heavy but u can't expect it to be light because it has the power of a desktop. Also if it's not on a flat surface it will NOT vent heat well. It gets extremely hot when it is running games. Those are my only complaints other than those it's an AWESOME computer
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Looks feels and works great. I don't particulary game too much
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this computer a few weeks ago. I'm thrilled with it! It packs a ton of power. Looks feels and works great. I don't particulary game too much. I mostly got this a portable solution to music production/recording. It's a bit heavy at 9 pounds, but what do you expect. I've fallen in love with alienware(even though dell now owns them) I'd suggest this to anyone in the gaming or audio fields. long live the PC
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: What can i say - this is the best computer I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: What can i say - this is the best computer I have ever owned. runs Adobe software like a charm, games play beautifully. I only wish you could custom color individual keys
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: POOR DOCUMENTATION
customer_reviews.text: This computer is actually quite excellent, fast and a great replacement for my old and trusty Gateway laptop. The reason I am giving it only three stars is the non-existent manual. There is a manual available on line but it is geared for those who want to open up the case and replace or add parts. This computer has many great features and user options, but there is no USER MANUAL! I had to get a Dell service tech to tell me about a feature that was not documented in any of the software or in the on line manual. OK DELL, get your act together and provide adequate service.
customer_reviews.author: Jim
